text:
Im starting new cozy game about delivery bot !
Chrome shift is on pause for a while, i very like this new concept and i wanna to make my first steam game not too complex for solodev , after this one i will return to my girl adventure 😅

#gamedev #cozygames #gameplay #indiegame https://t.co/c9TaGrvfwE
